response.answer_text: BEGINNING OF T-SERIES T-Series was started by Shri Gulshan Kumar in 1983.(Shri is a salutation prefix that Hindi speaking Indians use before a male name; just like Mr.) It started as a cheap destination for pirated Bollywood songs.In 1984 T-Series released its first ORIGINAL soundtrack. In 1990 T-Series gained huge popularity with the release of soundtrack of very successful romantic film Aashiqui. (The word Aashiqui means ROMANCE.) The film received widespread love from audience and was hugely successful. The music of this Bollywood feature film was even more successful and sold 20 million copies.Till date this is regarded as the best selling Bollywood album of all time. The songs of Aashiqui are still some of the most loved romantic songs played in India on radios, FM, public places etc. In 1997, Gulshan Kumar was assassinated by D-Company — the group which were accused of 1993 Bombay (Mumbai) bombings.In 2011, D-Company was placed third on the list of FBI’s WORLD’S 10 MOST WANTED FUGITIVES. After Gulshan Kumar’s death T-Series has been managed by his younger brother Krishan Kumar(not so successful actor, acting in only 5 films from 1993 to 2000 and they were either directed or produced by family members / T-Series) and Gulshan Kumar’s son Bhushan Kumar (film and music producer and composer) Read continue to know … How and Why T-Series grows so quickly - explained by an Indian

HI, T-Series, In the Mid 1980s, got a loophole in Music Property law where they incorporated Jhankar (kind of) music in un existing Songs and didn't need to pay a royalty to Music Houses, the add on music was superhit with changing generation and was liked by them, their cassettes sold like food in Langer. That was the beginning. Made Millions. Further, they broke the dominance of established Music Houses and gave an opportunity to new singer Anuradha Paudwal, Sonu Nigam, Altaf Raja the new age singer was like fresh air after dominance by the Mangeskar Sisters monopoly. gradually they ventured in new content and new music for the generation Y which helped them to mint money like anything. they have millions of music album and rural India after the advent of JIO Data opened the pandora box for them, as the taste of rural was same the kind of music T-Series has, this changed the Youtube dynamics and made Tseries the biggest earner on Google platform. T-Series, recipe to further success lies in giving a platform to every regional language song and to the artist thus the music is always new songs are different, imagine the music listeners population in each and every language in Bharat, This innovative approach of making a star of a rural singer give T-Series an upper hand in reaching the Mass. Collaborate and earn we all make money. that’s T-Series for you in 130 million population land.
